title: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not have any effect.
OB: Currently, when the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not take effect as expected.
EB: The display property of an item set to 'none' should make the item invisible in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Add a label to the document. 
2. Open the 'Properties' view for the label. 
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'. 
4. Observe that the label is still visible in the new PDF emitter.
